element.short: Base for all types and resources
element.definition: Base definition for all types defined in FHIR type system.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

element.definition: When valued in an instance, this attribute signals the imposition of a set of template-defined constraints. The value of this attribute provides a unique identifier for the templates in question
